overview:
Tally is the founder and president of iCardMall. With a background in gift card packaging (awarded and pending patents in the space) and environmental engineering, Tally’s new company allows her to combine two things she loves into one business - gift cards and green business solutions. eGift cards are a fast, easy and green way to give. At iCardMall, they can also be personalized and stylish with Tally’s patented virtual e-greeting card packaging.

iCardMall is the premier virtual gift card mall with over 75 brands of eGift cards to choose from. All the eGift cards can also be sent with a stylish and personalized eGreeting card. All the eGift cards can be viewed and printed from any PC and printer, or viewed and spent directly from any smart phone.
